participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

fitpr_physical.Description: In your opinion, compared to other kids your age, how much physical activity do you do? | 1=Much less; 2=A little less; 3=About the same; 4=A little more; 5=Much more

fitpr_physical_health.Description: In your opinion, do you think the amount of physical activity you do is healthy? | 1=Yes; 0=No

fitpr_sedentary.Description: In your opinion, compared to other kids your age, how many sedentary behaviors do you do? | 1=Much less; 2=A little less; 3=About the same; 4=A little more; 5=Much more

fitpr_sedentary_health.Description: In your opinion, do you think the amount of sedentary behaviors you do is healthy? | 1=Yes; 0=No

fitpr_sleep.Description: In your opinion, compared to other kids your age, how much sleep do you get? | 1=Much less; 2=A little less; 3=About the same; 4=A little more; 5=Much more

fitpr_sleep_health.Description: In your opinion, do you think the amount of sleep you get is healthy? | 1=Yes; 0=No

fitpo_physical.Description: In your opinion, compared to other kids your age, how much physical activity do you do? | 1=Much less; 2=A little Less; 3=About the same; 4=A little more; 5=Much More

fitpo_physical_healthy.Description: In your opinion, do you think the amount of physical activity you do is healthy? | 1=Yes; 0=No

fitpo_sedentary.Description: In your opinion, compared to other kids your age, how many sedentary behaviors do you do? | 1=Much less; 2=A little less; 3=About the same; 4=A little more; 5=Much more

fitpo_sendentary_healthy.Description: In your opinion, do you think the amount of sedentary behaviors you do is healthy? | 1=Yes; 0=No

fitpo_sleep.Description: In your opinion, compared to other kids your age, how much sleep do you get? | 1=Much less; 2=A little less; 3=About the same; 4=A little more; 5=Much more

fitpo_sleep_health.Description: In your opinion, do you think the amount of sleep you get is healthy? | 1=Yes; 0=No

fitpo_enjoy.Description: Did you enjoy using the Fitbit? | 1=Yes; 0=No

fitpo_use_app.Description: Did you use the app and website to see your Fitbit activity? | 1=Yes; 0=No

fitpo_potential_app.Description: Would you have liked to use the app and website to see your Fitbit activity? | 1=Yes; 0=No

fitpo_see_activity.Description: Did you like seeing your Fitbit activity? | 1=Yes; 0=No

fitpo_change.Description: Did you change your level of physical activity or amount of sleep based on the recorded activity on the app or website? | 1=Yes; 0=No

fitpo_wear_longer.Description: If you were asked to wear the Fitbit for longer, would you do it? | 1=Yes; 0=No
